casebody.data:
The PEOPLE etc., Respondent,
v.
Emmanuel ALMONTE, Appellant. Motion No: 2018-902 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided September 18, 2018

***1016Motion for assignment of counsel granted and Justine M. Luongo, Esq., Attorney-in-Chief, Criminal Defense Practice, The Legal Aid Society, 199 Water Street, New York, NY 10038 assigned as counsel to the appellant on the appeal herein.
